page.title: 10TOURIST OFFICE
page.content: This office is just across from the Pier where the{St.Ola}docks with its freight and passengers.From a small beginning Mrs Garson, with sometimes extra helpers ,deals with 12,000 people per year.The busiest months are obviously in the summer,and especially busy is Shopping Week,in July People come from all over the World,but are mostly British or American.Some can't speak any English but there's always someone around to interpret. The most popular questions are about Skara Brae or transport to Hoy.Mrs Garson has had some funny experiences and she keeps these in a book.Many have problems pronouncing Orkney place names.The Interpretation Room next door gives extra pictorial information about Orkney.There is also an accommodation service linked with Scotland to make sleeping arrangements easier.
